lore: When hunting, Efts work in groups, and their coordination is so good that they hardly ever fail to catch their prey. They grunt to communicate their position, and they wave their tails to indicate where they are going to move.\n\nThe Eft Stalker is an expert at camouflaging itself in nature. It usually remains motionless while other Efts chase prey and lead them to the Stalker, so it can deliver the coup de grace. On its own, it can hide behind a bush for hours until some unwary animal gets too close.
menagerieDialog: (This one is incredibly quiet before entering battle, its steps are barely heard.)
(It's quite a violent creature, but in a controlled sort of way. You can't help but wish your other creatures have a similar demeanor.)
(Despite its wild apperance, this creature is extremely loyal to you.)
(Its eyes are fixed on the horizon, deep in thought.)
(Its horns are so sharp and powerful that they could pierce through even the strongest of armor.)
name: Eft Stalker
